en.input_password_warning: Warning: Do not disclose this private key. Anyone with your private key can steal any assets held in your account.
en.protect_key_warning_2: provides full access to your wallet and funds.
en.protect_key_warning_3: Do not share this information with anyone.
en.protect_key_warning_4: The Utility support team does not ask for this information,
en.long_press_to_show_private_key: Long press to show private key
en.please_read_and_check_the_agreement: Please read and check the agreement
en.help_improve_title: Utility wants to collect usage data to better understand how our users interact with Utility. This data will be used to provide the service,including to improve the service based on your usage.
en.create_password_title: This password will only unlock your Utility wallet on this device.Utility cannot recover this password.
en.create_password_protocol: I understand that Utility cannot recover this password for me
en.the_password_length_cannot_be_less_than_: The password length cannot be less than 8 characters
en.keep_your_wallet_safe_title: Understand your secret recovery phrase and how to keep your wallet safe.
en.what_is_a_secret_recovery_phrase: What is a Secret Recovery Phrase?
en.what_is_a_secret_recovery_phrase_answer: Your Secret Recovery Phrase is a 12-word phrase that is the 'master private key' to your wallet and funds.
en.how_do_i_save_my_secret_recovery_phrase: How do I save my Secret Recovery Phrase?
en.how_do_i_save_my_secret_recovery_phrase_: a. Save to password management tool.
b. Store securely in a safe.
c. Write it down and store it in multiple secret locations.
en.should_i_share_my_secret_recovery_phrase: Should I share my Secret Recovery Phrase?
Do not share your secret recovery phrase, including with Utility!
en.skip_account_security_protocol: I understand that before I back up my account private key recovery phrase, I may lose my account and all of its assets.
en.creact_wallet_success_tip: You have successfully secured your wallet. Keep your secret recovery phrase safe and secret - it's your responsibility!
en.creact_wallet_success_illustrate1: Utility cannot recover your secret recovery phrase.
en.creact_wallet_success_illustrate2: Utility will never ask for your secret recovery phrase.
en.creact_wallet_success_illustrate3: Utility will never ask for your secret recovery phrase.
en.your_wallet_install_is_complete_tip: Fix Utility on your browser for easy access and easy viewing of transaction confirmations.
en.your_wallet_install_is_complete_tip1: You can open Utility Wallet by clicking on the extension and have one-click access to your wallet.
en.your_wallet_install_is_complete_tip2: Click on the browser extension icon to access it instantly.
en.remember_your_secret_recovery_phrase_tip: Write down this 12-word secret recovery phrase and then save it to a place that you trust and that only you can access.
a. Save to password management tool.
b. Store securely in a safe.
c. Write it down and store it in multiple secret locations.
en.make_sure_no_one_is_looking_at_your_scre: Make sure no one is looking at your screen
en.please_fill_in_the_correct_mnemonic_phra: Please fill in the correct mnemonic phrase
en.access_the_wallet_using_your_secret_reco: Access the wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase

Utility cannot recover your password. We will use your secret recovery phrase to verify your ownership, recover your wallet,and set a new password. First, enter the secret recovery phrase you got when you created the wallet.
en.state_logs_tip: State logs contain your public account address and sent transactions.
en.show_hex_data_tip: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
en.auto_lock_timer_minutes_tip: Set the idle time in minutes before Utility will become locked.
en.account_not_connected_to_any: {account} is not connected to any website yet.
en.allow_word: See address, account balance, activity and suggest transactions to approve
en.disconnect_warning: Are you sure you want to disconnect? You may lose site functionality.
en.show_balance_and_token_price_checker: Show balance and token price checker
en.price_checker_word: We use Utility APIs to display your balance and token price.
en.choose_your_network_word: We use Utility as our remote procedure call (RPC) provider to offer the most reliable data we can. You can choose your own RPC, but remember that any RPC will receive your IP address and wallet to make transactions.
en.participate_word: Participate in Utility Metrics to help us make Utility better
en.reveal_SRP_word_2: full access to your wallet and funds.
en.reveal_SRP_word_3: Utility is a non-custodial wallet. That means you are the owner of your SRP.
en.reveal_SRP_warning_1: Warning: Make sure no one is looking at your screen.
en.reveal_SRP_warning_2: Utility Support will never request this.
en.protect_your_SRP_word_2: full access to your wallet and funds.
en.protect_your_SRP_word_3: Do not share this information with anyone.
en.protect_your_SRP_word_4: The Utility support team does not ask for this information,

zh-cn.keep_your_wallet_safe_title: 了解您的账户助记词以及如何保护您的钱包安全
zh-cn.what_is_a_secret_recovery_phrase: 什么是账户私钥助记词？
zh-cn.what_is_a_secret_recovery_phrase_answer: 您的账户私钥助记词是由12个单词组成的短语，它是您的钱包和资金的“主私钥”
zh-cn.how_do_i_save_my_secret_recovery_phrase: 如何保存我的账户私钥助记词？
zh-cn.how_do_i_save_my_secret_recovery_phrase_: 3、写下并存储在多个秘密位置。
zh-cn.should_i_share_my_secret_recovery_phrase: 我是否应该分享我的账户私钥助记词？
切勿分享您的账户私钥助记词，包括也不能与Utility分享！
zh-cn.skip_account_security_protocol: 我明白，在我备份我的账户私钥助记词之前，我可能会丢失我的账户及其所有资产。
zh-cn.creact_wallet_success_tip: 您已经成功地保护了您的钱包。请确保您的账户私钥助记词安全和秘密——这是您的责任！
zh-cn.creact_wallet_success_illustrate1: Utility 无法恢复您的账户私钥助记词。
zh-cn.creact_wallet_success_illustrate2: Utility 绝对不会索要您的账户私钥助记词。
zh-cn.creact_wallet_success_illustrate3: 对任何人 切勿分享您的账户私钥助记词，否则您的资金有被盗风险
zh-cn.your_wallet_install_is_complete_tip: 在您的浏览器上固定Utility，以便访问并轻松查看交易确认。
zh-cn.click_the_browser_extension_icon: 点击浏览器扩展程序图标
zh-cn.your_wallet_install_is_complete_tip1: 您可以通过点击扩展程序打开 Utility，并一键访问您的钱包。
zh-cn.your_wallet_install_is_complete_tip2: 点击浏览器扩展程序图标即可即时访问它
zh-cn.remember_your_secret_recovery_phrase_tip: 请写下这个由12个单词组成的账户私钥助记词，然后将其保存到您信任并且只有您可以访问的地方。
3、写下并存储在多个秘密位置。
zh-cn.make_sure_no_one_is_looking_at_your_scre: 确保没有人在看您的屏幕
zh-cn.access_the_wallet_using_your_secret_reco: 使用账户私钥助记词访问钱包
Utility无法恢复您的密码。我们将使用您的私钥助记词来验证您的所有权、恢复您的钱包并设置新密码。首先，请输入创建钱包时获得的私钥助记词。
zh-cn.state_logs_tip: 状态日志包含您的公共账户地址和已发送的交易。
zh-cn.show_hex_data_tip: 选择此项以在发送屏幕上显示十六进制数据字段。
zh-cn.auto_lock_timer_minutes_tip: 设置 MetaMask 将被锁定前的空闲时间（单位：分钟）。
zh-cn.allow_word: 查看您允许的账户的地址
zh-cn.disconnect_warning: 您确定要断开连接吗？您可能会失去网站功能。
zh-cn.show_balance_and_token_price_checker: 显示余额和代币价格检查器
zh-cn.price_checker_word: 我们使用Utility的API来显示您的余额和代币价格。
zh-cn.choose_your_network_word: 我们使用 Utility 作为我们的远程过程调用（RPC）提供商，以提供最可靠和最私密的数据访问。您可以选择自己的 RPC，但请谨记，任何 RPC 都可以接收您的 IP 地址和钱包以进行交易。
zh-cn.participate_word: 加入Utility Metrics，帮助我们改进Utility
zh-cn.reveal_SRP_word_2: 对您钱包和资金的完整访问权限。
zh-cn.reveal_SRP_word_3: Utility是非托管钱包。这意味着您是自己的SRP的所有者。
zh-cn.reveal_SRP_warning_1: 警告：确保没有人在看您的屏幕。
zh-cn.reveal_SRP_warning_2: Utility 支持团队绝对不会要求提供此项信息。
